2455689471078230594.Text: Fortify spells temporarily increase fundamental attributes for the duration of the spell effects. The most common restoration spells of this kind are: nimbleness, fortitude, vigor, vitality, wisdom, jack of trades, charisma, feet of notorgo, powerwell, orc strength, and iron will.
